subtitle: Daily RSI — momentum view on the daily timeframe.

measures.caveats: Extremes can persist in strong trends.
measures.what_it_measures: Daily Rsi derived from market data.

assistant_hints: Favor crosses back through 30/70 over static extremes.
Combine with trend filters (e.g., daily EMA) for context.
Extremes can persist — scale entries, don’t assume immediate mean reversion.
Beware event risk that distorts daily momentum.
beginner_summary: Daily RSI — momentum view on the daily timeframe.
